name: STAR WARSÂ®: X-Wing (1998)
description: Installs the Updated 1998 version of X-Wing
notes:
GOG GameID: 1207666393
GOG Game Slug: star_wars_xwing_1998

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Star Wars - X-Wing (1998)/XWINGTIE.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
